message.body: Good morning sweet MaDonica! I hope your peer review search wasn't too aggravating

Hey sweeters!! It wasn't too bad. I just have this thing I've had my whole life where I hate doing things that I feel compromise my integrity. I found something ok I think. (Don't even remember what it is now!!) Ed jus scored some major points with me by
Oops...I can't find the Rolly guide email
It's in google drive shared with you.
Did you find it or do you need help? I still haven't filled in Shaoyang because that's not till next week.
You know I'm computer illiterate lol! I usually just get an email with a link. Okay.....here goes, my virgin effort! :-)
Be brave my darling! Yes I do know you are computer illiterate. That's why I wrote back to you!!
Sooooo, finally found it...we're doing yang ming?
Yes that is what he said I think! 98% sure. Yangming is my favorite. I hope it didn't take you that whole time. :)
It did take most of that time....and yang ming being your favorite makes you such a weirdo
I am proud to be a wonderful weirdo!
Good luck with that! :-)
It's why you love me.
Noooo, i love you despite it :-)
Yangming is the colon (ok, big daddy intestine for you) and the stomach.
No you love me for who I am exactly! At least I hope so.
I love that we get along despite my uterus.
Acupuncture=flesh and organs! Woohoo! Way to end my healing career! Lol!
You had to add the uterus! :-)
I love flesh but I don't think that's the point at all. Yangming is big appetite and hunger and excretion.
I save you from do many other references to uteri just because I love you.
Our etheric bodies have no appetite or excretion.....so potato potahto right! Lol.
And thanks for looking out with the hey nani nani references.
I don't know what to tell you. :) I have one understanding and you have another. I hope you don't think I'm dumb or wrong.
Not at all.....you're certainly not dumb.... Just the acupuncture that's available isn't energy medicine from what i can see, it's physical therapy focus
ed on the physical frame and organs and muscles and all that....we all learn differently...it's just a matter of all that, not better or worse..... But e
nergetic issues and patterns are carried lifetime to lifetime....soooooo, unless we're bringing organs and tendons and muscles in with us.....lol. But i
never think you're silly or dumb.... I wish sometimes tho you could sit in on a class with me that's devoted to real energy healing so we could have that
discussion....maybe some day you'll go with me
I would love to go with you. Invite me. I will likely come. The way I want to practice is not tendinomuscular. Though I would like to help sore necks and backs and knees sometimes too.
That's why in learning from Laura.
I know that for sure! You know i know you and your struggles for five element treatment of the whole person.

I will likely never take the same path as you but we will still love and respect each other, I hope. What we do at school is nothing like what I learn from Laura. Then again there are similarities. I just did something really exciting. I got a bus ticket
It was a $1 ticket!!!!!
Yay!
I am grateful for you but I don't have the background to know what you know and I probably don't have the brain power to do so in this lifetime! :) But that's ok. Maybe next time around.
I called Laura this morning with worries about my understanding of Ryan and she helped me. Maybe I will tell you a little big about it sometime.
You definitely have the brain power! But i just have put more tine in it in terms of years. that's all. Plus, we have different ray structures.....you h
ave a lot of six ray, i have lots of fifth and seventh. Soooooo we approach things differently....but still wanna help humanity, right? That new what's i
mportant.
Yes!
You still have to decide which ray is the cute ray body. Lol
Blasphemy!
Want to do a day trip to NYC on May 26? It's a Sunday. Long treatments start at 9am usually. Not alot of talking. Just sitting in treatments. You might not like it. Or you might.
More blasphemy! :-)
I'll think about it and let you know.....i think i have an inherent bias against the extended treatments.....but I'll examine myself and see where that's
:) I mean total respect to your tradition though. I like the ideas of rays within rays.
coming from...

Yeah I know, I'm inviting you with trepidation. I think we should wait till we can go to NYC for a day on a Friday when she is talking not treating. I think that would be better for you. Lets wait then. It just feels like it will be a long time till we ca
I think you need to use your mind and would like the talking workshop part better.
Cara might actually go on May 24 to the workshop. I want to go to buy have to miss two weeks of clinic for the IDs workshop in Maine this summer so I can't go to that too.
NYC is definitely better for you than Maine because you can slip in and slip out.
Definitely a good idea. Could i ask her questions too?
Yes you could talk during the workshop. :) On long treatment days there is not a lot of time to talk. Just back to back treatments. I don't think that would be as satisfying for you.

The workshop days are not droning lectures. More like whatever learning arises from the group. You have so many questions I'm not sure there would ever be time to really sink to the vote with you and clear everything up but you could try. Today Laura told

If you did go to long tx days the first time anyone sits in a long tx they wear white and are in the role of the witness. The witness sits in the tx and watches whatever is of interest to them. You would watch well bc you are a natural observer.
But you want to know/understand more than watch. I think.
Plus.....i have my own issues of course . Okay...radio silence for a bit, back to my hearing! Ciao!
I love you.
And i love you....

I know. I want you to know that I love you no matter what. I don't want our separate ways of understanding to come between us. I really look up to you. And I think that you are caring towards others. Which is important to me.
Same with me...exactly
:* Sideways kisses.
See you in class..... Maybe! :-)
You should be bad and stay home!!!!
